Root.Tooltip: This system has taken heavy damage and can no longer be used.
Root.Name: Fabrication Matrix Disabled

Root.Tooltip: Quickly warps in a Pylon with 2 Zealots and 2 Stalkers to any visible location.
Root.Name: Warp In Reinforcements

Root.Tooltip: Increases the target structure's unit warp in and research speeds by 1000% for 20.
Root.Name: Chrono Surge

Root.Tooltip: Quickly warps in a Pylon to any visible location.
Root.Name: Deploy Pylon

Root.Tooltip: Instantly teleport all of your forces to the Core.
Root.Name: Emergency Recall

Root.Tooltip: This system has taken heavy damage and can no longer be used.
Root.Name: Assault Cluster Disabled

Root.Tooltip: Strafes the target area with 3 laser beams, dealing 200 damage with each beam.
Root.Name: Solar Lance

Root.Tooltip:
Drops 3 Temporal Fields that freeze enemy units and structures in time for 20 seconds.

Heroic units are slowed by 50%.
Root.Name: Temporal Field

Root.Tooltip: Fire 5 lasers onto the battlefield from orbit, each of them dealing 50 (100 vs armored units) area damage.
Root.Name: Orbital Strike

Root.Tooltip: This system has taken heavy damage and can no longer be used.
Root.Name: Defensive Cluster Disabled

Root.Tooltip: Instantly teleports all friendly units in the target area to your primary Nexus. Protects teleported units with a barrier that absorbs up to 100 damage and lasts for 20 seconds.
Root.Name: Mass Recall

Root.Tooltip: Allows friendly units and structures to absorb up to 100 damage. Lasts for 20 seconds.
Root.Name: Shield Overcharge

Root.Tooltip:
Deploys Fenix onto the battlefield, dealing 200 damage to enemy units in the target area upon impact.

Fenix attacks on his own and can cast Whirlwind, Thunderous Charge and Shield Capacitors.

Fenix leaves the battlefield after 30.
Root.Name: Deploy Fenix

Root.Tooltip: This system has taken heavy damage and can no longer be used.
Root.Name: Annihilation Cluster Disabled

Root.Tooltip: Freezes all enemies in time for 20 seconds.
Root.Name: Time Stop

Root.Tooltip: Fires 200 random shots from the Spear of Adun, devastating the target area for 15. Each shot deals 15 (30 vs Armored) area damage.
Root.Name: Solar Bombardment

Root.Tooltip: Fires a beam that deals 750 (1500 vs Armored) damage over 15 seconds. The beam will auto-acquire targets if not manually controlled.
Root.Name: Purifier Beam

Root.Tooltip:
Drops 3 Temporal Fields that freeze enemy units and structures in time for 20 seconds.

Heroic units are slowed by 50%.
Root.Name: Temporal Field

Root.Tooltip:
Drops 3 Temporal Fields that freeze enemy units and structures in time for 20 seconds.

Heroic units are slowed by 50%.
Root.Name: Temporal Field

Root.Tooltip: Fire 5 lasers onto the battlefield from orbit, each of them dealing 50 (100 vs armored units) area damage.
Root.Name: Orbital Strike

Root.Tooltip: Strafes the target area with 3 laser beams, dealing 200 damage with each beam.
Root.Name: Solar Lance

Root.Tooltip: Mechanical units are automatically repaired for 5 (10 for structures) life per second. Up to 3 targets can be repaired at once.**Passive ability**
Root.Name: Reconstruction Beam

Root.Tooltip: Fire 5 lasers onto the battlefield from orbit, each of them dealing 50 (100 vs armored units) area damage.
Root.Name: Orbital Strike

Root.Tooltip: Cancels construction of this structure, destroying the structure and giving a partial refund.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Vespene Gas is automatically harvested from Assimilators without requiring Probes.**Passive ability**
Root.Name: Orbital Assimilator

Root.Tooltip: The Nexus automatically attacks nearby enemy ground and air units for 30 damage.**Passive ability**
Root.Name: Nexus Overcharge

Root.Tooltip: Stargates and Robotics Facilities can transform to utilize Warp In technology. Warp In cooldowns are 20% faster than original build times.**Passive ability**
Root.Name: Warp Harmonization

Root.Tooltip: All friendly units gain 25% movement speed and 15% attack speed within Pylon power fields. Effect lasts for up to 15 seconds after leaving.**Passive ability**
Root.Name: Matrix Overload

Root.Tooltip: Mechanical units are automatically repaired for 5 (10 for structures) life per second. Up to 3 targets can be repaired at once.**Passive ability**
Root.Name: Reconstruction Beam

Root.Tooltip: Friendly units become invulnerable for 5, preventing death. Each unit can be shielded only once every 60.**Passive ability**
Root.Name: Guardian Shell
